title: The Classroom
creator_credit: Eltham Films, Patrick Ryan and Tim Burstall
brief_description: Puppet film for children. Sebastian the Fox appears in a typical classroom with children playing pranks on their master as well as on each other. As so often happens the innocent are punished, in this case Sebastian. The offenders are eventually caught and receive their just desserts.
